name: Etheric Compass
desc: An etheric compass points towards the nearest source of ether. A weak source of ether will weakly pull the pointer, making it loose, while a strong source will pull it tightly. Multiple nearby sources will cause the compass to waver, often flicking back and forth.
The compass often points towards nearby enchanted runes or other runic items, but can also point towards areas such as an ether-dense cave system.
